name: Meditation Island
description:
Released during a polar vortex with temperatures as low as -50 with wind chill, Meditation Island attempts to give you a place to escape to. Explore an island freely, with no conflict, goals, or objectives. Use the droning ambient music as a breathing guide and relax. Headphones strongly encouraged.

Made as an experiment to get comfortable creating in VR.

Made With:

Gaia

VRTK

DroneMachine

and Unity.

Oculus Rift Consumer Version only.
